thread.title: Alleged McDormand Oscar thief pleads not guilty

title: Alleged McDormand Oscar thief pleads not guilty
text:
Alleged McDormand Oscar thief pleads not guilty 11:47am EST - 01:00 
Terry Bryant, the man who allegedly stole Frances McDormand's Oscar, pleaded not guilty in a Los Angeles courtroom on Wednesday to a charge of felony grand theft. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
